verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. Many a <S%H7227>time<s%> have they <S%H6887>afflicted<s%> me from my <S%H5271>youth<s%> <S%H3478>up<s%>, Let Israel now <S%H559>say<s%>,
Many a <S%H7227>time<s%> have they <S%H6887>afflicted<s%> me from my <S%H5271>youth<s%> <S%H3201>up<s%>: Yet they have not prevailed against me.
The <S%H2790>plowers<s%> <S%H2790>plowed<s%> upon my <S%H1354>back<s%>; They made <S%H748>long<s%> their <S%H4618>furrows<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H6662>righteous<s%>: He hath cut <S%H7112>asunder<s%> the <S%H5688>cords<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
Let them be put to <S%H954>shame<s%> and <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>backward<s%>, All they that <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
Let them be as the <S%H2682>grass<s%> upon the <S%H1406>housetops<s%>, Which <S%H3001>withereth<s%> <S%H6927>before<s%> it groweth <S%H8025>up<s%>;
Wherewith the <S%H7114>reaper<s%> <S%H4390>filleth<s%> not his <S%H3709>hand<s%>, Nor he that bindeth <S%H6014>sheaves<s%> his <S%H2683>bosom<s%>.
Neither do they that go <S%H5674>by<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> be upon <S%H1288>you<s%>; We bless you in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
